name: Spotify
description: Spotify API integration for managing playlists and user library.

permissions.name: Read Private Playlists
permissions.description: Read access to a user's private playlists.

permissions.name: Modify Public Playlists
permissions.description: Write access to a user's public playlists.

permissions.name: Modify Private Playlists
permissions.description: Write access to a user's private playlists.

permissions.name: Read User Library
permissions.description: Read access to a user's library.

permissions.name: Modify User Library
permissions.description: Write/delete access to a user's library.

operations.name: Create Playlist
operations.description: Create a new playlist for a user.

operations.name: Add Tracks to Playlist
operations.description: Add one or more tracks to a playlist.

operations.name: Get Playlist's Tracks
operations.description: Get a list of the tracks in a playlist.

operations.name: Remove Playlist Tracks
operations.description: Remove one or more tracks from a playlist.

operations.name: Get Current User's Playlists
operations.description: Get a list of the playlists owned or followed by the current Spotify user.
